appDescription.message: Chrome multi-threaded downloader extension,based on Aria2 and AriaNg.

optionsBlacklistHint.description: Blacklist URL downloads will not be intercepted
optionsBlacklistHint.message:
Blacklist URL downloads will not be intercepted 
One line per URL, the URL can be either a page link or a real download link, supporting regular expressions 
example:
pan.baidu.com
http(s)?:\/\/\w+.baidupcs.com\/file\/

optionsFileSize.description: The minimum file size to intercept (MB)
optionsFileSize.message: The minimum file size to intercept (MB)

optionsIfIntercept.description: Automatically intercept download tasks to Aria2c,Use Camtd to take over Chrome's default download behavior.
optionsIfIntercept.message: Automatically intercept download tasks to Aria2c,Use Camtd to take over Chrome's default download behavior.

optionsWhitelistHint.description: Only whitelisted URL downloads will be blocked
optionsWhitelistHint.message:
Only whitelist URL downloads will intercept 
One line per URL, the URL can be either a page link or a real download link, supporting regular expressions 
example:
pan.baidu.com
http(s)?:\/\/\w+.baidupcs.com\/file\/
